# Example 
```{r}
set.seed(2021)

series_length <- 25
ar_coefficient <- .6

y <- arima.sim(series_length, 
               model = list(ar = ar_coefficient))
x <- 1:series_length

fit <- lm(y~x)

plot(x, y)
abline(fit, col = "blue")

```
